name: Netdown (0R_N0)
description:
- Made for the 7drl 2022 game jam -

Created with parts of a previous game project, reworked, scoped down and simplified.

Game objective: go through the various levels until you reach level 10 where you will find the escape door

Controls: AWSD (movements), Mouse + click (targeting and shooting enemies), H (if health pack 3x available)

Hint: you need to be close enough in order to shoot enemies and boxes. 

Hint 2: There are no melee weapons, if hitting an enemy you gain damage.
